Articles.Content:
So here's a little challenge I've made up. Take my seaplane on a rocket from kerbin to either eve or bonus points laythe. you have to build a rocket [U][B]around[/B][/U] the aircraft. plus it would be a very nice 18th birthday gift from you guys :D.

The Stingray- [url]http://kerbalx.com/Gm7/Stingray[/url]
